title-english: Women Throughout the Month of November
creator: Bint Al Nil
description-english: This article presents women-related news covering the past month, including coverage of an event that took place at the Greek Embassy with only 18 invitees and a brief feature of the wife of the British Ambassador to Egypt and her passion for sports.
description-arabic: تستعرض المقالة الأخبار المتعلقة بالمرأة خلال شهر نوفمبر المنصرم، وتشمل تغطية لحفل أقيم بالسفارة اليونانية واقتصر على 18 مدعوًا، وفقرة عن زوجة السفير البريطاني في القاهرة وحبها للرياضة.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
